diamondCut((address,uint8,bytes4[])[],ad.details: Be aware that `_calldata` is executed with delegatecall on the `_init` contract

params._calldata: A function call, including function selector and arguments
params._diamondCut: Contains the facet addresses and function selectors
params._init: The address of the contract or facet to execute `_calldata`

DiamondCut((address,uint8,bytes4[])[],ad.notice: Emitted when facet selectors are modified

diamondCut((address,uint8,bytes4[])[],ad.notice: Adds/replaces/removes any number of functions and optionally executes a function with delegatecall

userdoc.notice: Declares related functions for executing a diamond cut
